mapper.select: select id, pointId, equipmentId, bmsTotWarning, bmsTotFault, batteryStackVoltLimit, batteryStackCurLimit from bms where pointId = #{pointId}
select count(*) as totalCounts, count( case when bmsTotFault = 1 then 1 end ) as faultCounts from bms
mapper.insert: insert into bms ( pointId, equipmentId, bmsTotWarning, bmsTotFault, batteryStackVoltLimit, batteryStackCurLimit ) values( #{pointId}, #{equipmentId}, #{bmsTotWarning}, #{bmsTotFault}, #{batteryStackVoltLimit}, #{batteryStackCurLimit} )
